text: Parakode is one of the main junction situated in the outskirts of Adoor in Pathanamthitta District, Kerala state, India. ==Politics== Parakode is a part of Pathanamthitta district Panchayat. It comes under Adoor assembly constituency in Pathanamthitta (Lok Sabha constituency) . Shri. Chittayam Gopakumar is the current MLA of Adoor. Shri. Anto Antony is the current member of parliament of Pathanamthitta. ==Geography== The main part of Parakode is a junction in Kayamkulam-Punalur road. It connects places Pathanapuram, Punalur, etc to Adoor. ==Demographics== Malayalam is the native language of Parakode. ==See this== Arukalickal ==References== Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Parakode
